description:
When Lina`s crew lands in search of food, Filia gives Inverse a letter from her sister and reveals that the gang has been chosen for an important mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanshinhangi? Kuni kara no Tegami ni!
Incrédulité ? Une lettre venue de chez moi !
半信半疑? 故郷[くに]からの手紙に!
